snippet.title: 'False Awakening' Episode 1 | Developer's Playthrough | RPG Maker Game
snippet.description:
~ 'False Awakening' is a dark, story-focused, psychological game, about a young man who is stuck in his dream, and is unable to wake up from it.

~ Extended Title: False Awakening Episode 1: "Am I... in a dream? | Developer's Playthrough

~ So! This is my first game project that I started working on about four months ago. Since I realized it would take quite a lot of time to complete, I decided to release it in small episodes. 
This playthrough, is the first episode. More, coming soon! ('soon' being... a month or two...)
.
~ If you want to download the game and play it yourself, then you can go and download it from the link below! (Its free!... mostly because I have issues with the online payment method the site requires. XD )
https://sigmasuccour.itch.io/false-awakening-episode1


--------MUSIC BY: 

~Patrick De Arteaga
Song used: 'I Miss You'.
Link: https://patrickdearteaga.com/royalty-free-music/

~Ross Budgen
Song used: 'Elevance'.
Link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=moT39dADMSk

~Jake D. Bind
Songs used: 'Requiem for the Lost', 'Stressless', 'Killed Music', 'Brave Heart', and 'She Remained'.
Link: http://www.rpgmakerweb.com/a/jdb-artist/inspirational-vol-3
http://store.steampowered.com/app/271962/RPG_Maker_VX_Ace__Inspirational_Vol_2/
[Copyright](C) JDB Artist

~ (The complete credit list is quite long. You can find it along with the game file.)

#RPGMaker #SigmaSuccour #Psychological
